metadata.scenario: Customer service interaction about a delayed package

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm writing to inquire about the status of my package. The tracking number is 1Z999AA1234567890.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm looking into the tracking number 1Z999AA1234567890 for you now. One moment please.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thanks. I was supposed to receive it three days ago, and the tracking hasn't updated in what feels like forever. It's stuck on 'In Transit'.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your concern. I see that the package is currently 'In Transit' and experiencing a slight delay due to unforeseen circumstances at our regional sorting facility. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Unforeseen circumstances? What does that even *mean*? Is my package lost? And what's the *new* estimated delivery date? I need this item urgently.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: While I don't have specific details regarding the nature of the 'unforeseen circumstances,' I can assure you that we are actively working to get your package back on track. I will manually push an inquiry to the sorting facility and request an updated ETA. Please allow 24-48 hours for a response. In the meantime, I suggest checking the tracking again tomorrow afternoon. You can also create a missing package report online.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I guess that's all I can do. But if I don't hear anything in 48 hours, I'll be contacting you again. Thanks (I guess).
